entry.title: SMOG WARNING , Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:18 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -26.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
